text:
Had my car serviced for the past 3 years at Performance Motors BMW Kampong Arang with Nicky Lee servicing advisor which his exceptional service is truly commendable.

He was pleasant, understanding, and kind throughout the process. What stood out most was his proactive communication—he kept me updated at every stage of the repair by calling. This transparency allowed me to plan my commute effectively, which I greatly appreciated. Such professionalism and thoughtfulness make a big difference.

Thank you Nicky and PML Kampong Arang servicing team for making each routine servicing visit hassle-free with great support. Keep up the good work!

I recently had my BMW serviced at the Kampong Arang service center, which included routine maintenance, installation of the latest OBU, and some repair work. I’m extremely impressed with the entire experience—the service was efficient, the workmanship was top-notch, and the whole process was smooth from start to finish.

What really stood out was the exceptional customer service from Nicky. He was friendly, professional, and genuinely helpful throughout. Nicky took the time to understand my concerns, kept me well-informed with regular updates, and made sure everything was handled with care. His communication was clear and consistent, which made the experience stress-free and easy to manage.

It’s rare to come across someone who goes the extra mile the way Nicky did. His attention to detail and dedication to customer satisfaction truly made a difference.

Huge thanks to Nicky and the Kampong Arang team for a fantastic experience. I’ll definitely be returning, and I highly recommend this service center to any BMW owner looking for reliable, high-quality service.

I recently had my BMW serviced at the Kampong Arang service center, and I was thoroughly impressed with the level of service I received. The staff was friendly and professional. In particular, I'd like to commend Jaslyn for her outstanding customer service. She was incredibly helpful, knowledgeable, and went above and beyond to ensure my needs were met. She kept me updated throughout the process and made the entire experience smooth and stress-free. The service itself was efficient and of high quality. I highly recommend this service center, and especially want to thank Jaslyn for her exceptional service!

Eunice Phuah was my CSA at PML Kampong Arang when I sent in my car for a check recently.
I really appreciate the excellent customer service I received, she was not only attentive and patient while listening to my concerns, but also went the extra mile by sharing her mobile number to keep me updated. She was quick to check with the past records, polite in her communication, and took the initiative to call me back with updates. Her professionalism and personal touch truly made the whole experience smooth and reassuring. Thank you Eunice!

Had a really good experience with customer service agent Jaslyn! She was super patient in explaining everything and made sure I understood what was going on. She was also quick to sort out the problems and even managed to get the car fixed and delivered on time. Really appreciate her help – great service!
